title: When I was a little girl my grandfather would take us to eat at a restuarant near where the Bridge Tender is now called Faircloths Seafood restuarant. The seafood was great and they had the most unusual crabcakes. I wonder if there are any of the people that remember the recipe for this crabcake and what a wonderful place this was to go for Sunday Dinner.
